name: Optional.Publisher
desc: The type of a Combine publisher that publishes the value of a Swift optional instance to each subscriber exactly once, if the instance has any value at all.

items.name: typealias Optional.Publisher.Output
items.desc: The kind of value published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Optional.Publisher.Failure
items.desc: The kind of error this publisher might publish.

items.name: init(Optional<Wrapped>.Publisher.Output?)
items.desc: Creates a publisher to emit the value of the optional, or to finish immediately if the optional doesn’t have a value.

items.name: let output: Optional<Wrapped>.Publisher.Output?
items.desc: The output to deliver to each subscriber.

items.name: func receive<S>(subscriber: S)
items.desc: Implements the Publisher protocol by accepting the subscriber and immediately publishing the optional’s value if it has one, or finishing normally if it doesn’t.
